class.name: ExampleFileSystemView
class.javadoc:
This is a simple example that uses the FileSystemView class. You can provide a superclass of the FileSystemView class with your own functionality.
Pavel Porvatov
Creates a new folder with the default name "New folder". This method is invoked when the user presses the "New folder" button.
Returns a list which appears in a drop-down list of the FileChooser component. In this implementation only the home directory is returned.

Returns a string that represents a directory or a file in the FileChooser component. A string with all upper case letters is returned for a directory. A string with all lower case letters is returned for a file.
